'''Happy (And Hot) Feet''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Extreme Weather Disaster!?]]''.

==Trivia==
* The name of this Achievement may be a reference to the film ''{{w|Happy Feet}}''. It features {{w|penguins}}, whose bodies quite resemble the [[Flowfire Bird]]s.
